text: Sylvester Norris (born February 18, 1957) is an American former professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball Association for the San Antonio Spurs in 17 games during the 1979–80 season. He averaged 2.4 points and 2.5 rebounds per game. He is the older brother of Audie Norris, who also played in the NBA for the Portland Trail Blazers. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Italy Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Mississippi Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Jackson State Tigers basketball players Category:San Antonio Spurs draft picks Category:San Antonio Spurs players Category:Sportspeople from Jackson, Mississippi
title: Sylvester Norris (basketball)
